title: Snakes and Ladders

sections.heading: HOW TO PLAY
sections.body:
• Connect a switch to a switch‑accessible spinner or die*.
• Set up a game of Snakes and Ladders, or display the game on a classroom smartboard for the whole class to join in.
• The switch user rolls the die by pressing their switch during the game.
* If a spinner/die isn’t available, search YouTube for a "Roll a die" video and use a wired or wireless switch with a switch interface to start and pause the video which simulates a die being thrown.

tooltipText: Use a switch accessible spinner or die to join in a game of Snakes and Ladders
